agricraft.tooltip.magnifying_glass: A tool to inspect the genome of crops
agricraft.tooltip.clipper: A tool to clip flowers or leaves of plants
agricraft.tooltip.journal_use_1: Sneak + Right click to place on a Seed Analyzer
agricraft.tooltip.journal_use_2: Right click to read, scroll to flip pages
agricraft.tooltip.rake: A tool to remove weeds from crops
agricraft.tooltip.trowel: A tool to move crops around
agricraft.tooltip.seed_bag_active: It always seems to know what seeds you need.
agricraft.tooltip.seed_bag_sorter: The bag is currently sorting by
agricraft.tooltip.seed_bag_main_hand: Use from main hand to plant seeds directly from the bag
agricraft.tooltip.seed_bag_off_hand: Use from off hand to insert or extract seeds to your main hand
agricraft.tooltip.seed_bag_scrolling: Shift + Scroll to change sorting modes
agricraft.tooltip.seed_bag_inactive_1: Better not use it like this, you will lose track of my seeds.
agricraft.tooltip.seed_bag_inactive_2: Mayhaps you should try enchanting it first.
agricraft.tooltip.analyzer.l1: Can be used to inspect genomes of seeds
agricraft.tooltip.analyzer.l2: While observing, scroll to cycle through the genes
agricraft.tooltip.tank.l1: Try not to fall in... or at least not before attaching a ladder
agricraft.tooltip.sprinkler.l1: Attaches to the bottom of Irrigation Channels
agricraft.tooltip.grate.l1: A decorative block which can also be climbed
agricraft.tooltip.grate.l2: Vines can be attached, and removed with clippers
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.soil: This plant will only grow on a specific soil
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.soil.humidi: This plant needs a specific soil humidity to grow
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.soil.acidit: This plant needs a specific soil acidity to grow
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.soil.nutrie: This plant needs specific soil nutrients to grow
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.light: This plant will only grow at a specific light level
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.redstone: This plant will only grow with a specific redstone power at its roots
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.fluid: This plant will only grow in a certain fluid
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.biome: This plant needs to be in a certain biome
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.biome_categ: This plant will only grow in a certain type of biome
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.dimension: This plant will only grow in a certain dimension
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.with_weed: This plant will only grow with a weed present
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.without_wee: This plant will only grow with a weed absent
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.day: This plant will only grow during the day
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.dusk: This plant will only grow at dusk
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.night: This plant will only grow at night
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.dawn: This plant will only grow at dawn
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.block_below: This plant will only grow with a specific block below its roots
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.block_nearb: This plant will only grow with a certain amount of specific blocks nearby
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.entity_near: This plant will only grow with a certain amount of specific entities nearby
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.season: This plant will only grow during certain seasons
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.structure_i: This plant will only grow in or near a certain structure
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.structure_o: This plant will not grow in or near a certain structure
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.soil.humidi: This plant can not grow on a soil with this humidity
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.soil.acidit: This plant can not grow on a soil with this acidity
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.soil.nutrie: This plant can not grow on a soil with these nutrients
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.light.gener: This plant can not grow at the current light level
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.season.gene: This plant can not grow during the current season
agricraft.tooltip.gene.animal_attractant: This plant might attract the attention of cows
This plant might attract the attention of chickens
This plant might attract the attention of pandas
This plant might attract the attention of pigs
This plant might attract the attention of rabbits
This plant might attract the attention of sheep
This plant might attract the attention of turtles
agricraft.message.analyzer_view_blocked: I can not observe the seed like this, the view is obstructed.
agricraft.message.clipping_impossible: There is nothing worth clipping here.
agricraft.message.trowel_weed: I can not reach well, I should remove the weeds first.
agricraft.message.trowel_plant: There already is a plant here.
agricraft.message.trowel_no_plant: There is nothing here to grab.
agricraft.journal.introduction.paragraph: This is your very own Agricultural Journal, in here you can keep track of all the seeds you have discovered. To get started, simply place the journal on a seed analyzer and start analyzing seeds!

When analyzing the genome of a seed, you learn one or two things about it, such as what kind of environments it likes, how it will grow, what fruits it might bear, and to and from which other species it might mutate.
Can you discover all plant species?
agricraft.plant.allium.name: Allium
agricraft.plant.allium.desc: From the family of plants including the garlic, onion, and chive this plant produces a beautiful umbel consisting of many small purple blooms.
agricraft.plant.bamboo.name: Bamboo
agricraft.plant.beet_root.name: Beet Root
agricraft.plant.brown_mushroom.name: Brown Mushroom
agricraft.plant.cactus.name: Cactus
agricraft.plant.carrot.name: Carrot
agricraft.plant.cornflower.name: Cornflower
agricraft.plant.cornflower.desc: Also known as the bachelor's button.
agricraft.plant.crimson_fungus.name: Crimson Fungus
agricraft.plant.crimson_fungus.desc: It secretes a peculiar red ooze.
agricraft.plant.daisy.name: Daisy
agricraft.plant.dandelion.name: Dandelion
agricraft.plant.dandelion.desc: While colloquially considered a weed, this yellow-flowering plant is one of unspoken value. Having a deep-rooting taproot, the plant brings up nutrients from lower levels of soil, making it a good companion plant for shallow rooting plants.
agricraft.plant.kelp.name: Kelp
agricraft.plant.kelp.desc: The vegan mermaid's snack of preference.
agricraft.plant.lily.name: Lily
agricraft.plant.melon.name: Melon
agricraft.plant.nether_wart.name: Nether Wart
agricraft.plant.nether_wart.desc: An oddity from the nether, said to have somewhat mystical properties. The fungus appears to have a strong aptitude for heat, yet oddly cannot withstand the burning of the sun. Its fruit makes a covetable prize for the aspiring young brewer.
agricraft.plant.orange_tulip.name: Orange Tulip
agricraft.plant.orchid.name: Orchid
agricraft.plant.pink_tulip.name: Pink Tulip
agricraft.plant.pink_tulip.desc: A pink varient of the perrenial tulip plant. The plant is valued mostly for its distinctive blooms.
agricraft.plant.poppy.name: Poppy
agricraft.plant.poppy.desc: Producing colorful blooms, this plant has gained a reputation for certain medicinal uses. A better use, perhaps, this plant produces seeds that go well with baked goods, particularly for lemon-flavored ones.
agricraft.plant.potato.name: Potato
agricraft.plant.potato.desc: Po-ta-toes! Boil them, mash them, stick them in a stew.
agricraft.plant.pumpkin.name: Pumpkin
agricraft.plant.pumpkin.desc: If I eat enough of these will I turn orange?
agricraft.plant.red_mushroom.name: Red Mushroom
agricraft.plant.red_tulip.name: Red Tulip
agricraft.plant.red_tulip.desc: A vibrant red varient of the perrenial tulip plant. The plant is valued mostly for its distinctive blooms.
agricraft.plant.sea_grass.name: Sea Grass
agricraft.plant.sea_pickle.name: Sea Pickle
agricraft.plant.sea_pickle.desc: Not as tasty as one might expect.
agricraft.plant.sweet_berry.name: Sweet Berry
agricraft.plant.sweet_berry.desc: You should make a cake out of it.
agricraft.plant.sugarcane.name: Sugarcane
agricraft.plant.sugarcane.desc: High in fructose, a healthy part of your daily breakfast.
agricraft.plant.warped_fungus.name: Warped Fungus
agricraft.plant.wheat.name: Wheat
agricraft.plant.wheat.desc: The cornerstone of the Agriculutural Revolution.
agricraft.plant.white_tulip.name: White Tulip
agricraft.plant.white_tulip.desc: A snow-white varient of the perrenial tulip plant. The plant is valued mostly for its distinctive blooms.
agricraft.plant.wither_rose.name: Wither Rose
agricraft.plant.wither_rose.desc: Nobody likes their roses withering, but this is on another level.
agricraft.plant.aurigold.name: Aurigold
agricraft.plant.carbonation.name: Carbonation
agricraft.plant.carbonation.desc: A rare flower which has driven itself to the edge of extinction due its high flammability.
agricraft.plant.cuprosia.name: Cuprosia
agricraft.plant.cuprosia.desc: Known as the engineer's delight, this plant produces a substance of incredible utility.
agricraft.plant.diamahlia.name: Diamahlia
agricraft.plant.emeryllis.name: Emeryllis
agricraft.plant.ferranium.name: Ferranium
agricraft.plant.jaslumine.name: Jaslumine
agricraft.plant.jaslumine.desc: Jaslumine to some, Jaluminium to me. Shines like silver, but not all that valuable of a plant.
agricraft.plant.lapender.name: Lapender
agricraft.plant.niccissus.name: Niccissus
agricraft.plant.niccissus.desc: While there is much debate over which is the best plant, we can all agree that the Niccissus plant is by far the most self-absorbed.
agricraft.plant.nitorwart.name: Nitor Wart
agricraft.plant.nitorwart.desc: It sure seems to like to glow.
agricraft.plant.osmonium.name: Osmonium
agricraft.plant.osmonium.desc: An unusually rare plant, thought to originate from outer space.
agricraft.plant.petinia.name: Petinia
agricraft.plant.petinia.desc: A distant cousin of the familiar petunia flower, this plant produces a substance frequently used to plate metal cans.
agricraft.plant.platiolus.name: Platiolus
agricraft.plant.platiolus.desc: The unquestioned king among the metal-bearing plants, this plant has a gleam to it that puts even the aurigold flower to shame.
agricraft.plant.plombean.name: Plombean
agricraft.plant.plombean.desc: In ancient times this plant was thought to bear a lifegiving fruit. Nowadays we know better.
agricraft.plant.quartzanthemum.name: Quartzanthemum
agricraft.plant.redstodendron.name: Redstodendron
agricraft.plant.redstodendron.desc: Much more complex than the average red algea.
agricraft.weed.weed.name: Weeds
agricraft.soil.clay.name: Clay Soil
agricraft.soil.crimson_nylium.name: Crimson Nylium Soil
agricraft.soil.farmland.name: Farmland Soil
agricraft.soil.mycelium.name: Mycelium Soil
agricraft.soil.podzol.name: Podzol Soil
agricraft.soil.sand.name: Sand Soil
agricraft.soil.soul_sand.name: Soul Sand Soil
agricraft.soil.soul_soil.name: Soul Soil Soil
agricraft.soil.gravel.name: Gravel Soil
agricraft.soil.warped_nylium.name: Warped Nylium Soil
agricraft.plant.botania_black_flower.des: A beautiful flower that is as dark as the night.
agricraft.plant.botania_blue_flower.name: Mystical Blue Flower
agricraft.plant.botania_blue_flower.desc: A beautiful flower that is as blue as the sea.
agricraft.plant.botania_brown_flower.des: A beautiful flower that is as brown as the dirt.
agricraft.plant.botania_cyan_flower.name: Mystical Cyan Flower
agricraft.plant.botania_cyan_flower.desc: A beautiful flower of indeterminate color, being both green and blue.
agricraft.plant.botania_gray_flower.name: Mystical Gray Flower
agricraft.plant.botania_gray_flower.desc: A beautiful flower, albeit rather non-descript.
agricraft.plant.botania_green_flower.des: This flower seems to be envious of its other cousins with better descriptions.
agricraft.plant.botania_light_blue_flowe: A beautiful flower that is blue as the sky on a sunny day.
agricraft.plant.botania_light_gray_flowe: A beautiful flower, albeit even more non-descript than its cousin, the Mystical Gray Flower.
agricraft.plant.botania_lime_flower.name: Mystical Lime Flower
agricraft.plant.botania_lime_flower.desc: I wonder if this flower would taste sour?
agricraft.plant.botania_magenta_flower.d: A beautiful flower, of color which my printer is always out.
agricraft.plant.botania_orange_flower.de: A beautiful flower with a fiery disposition.
agricraft.plant.botania_pink_flower.name: Mystical Pink Flower
agricraft.plant.botania_pink_flower.desc: A truly beautiful flower, emanating the throes of a powerful primal force.
agricraft.plant.botania_purple_flower.de: A beautiful flower with a regal color, it certainly is of the royal lineage.
agricraft.plant.botania_red_flower.name: Mystical Red Flower
agricraft.plant.botania_red_flower.desc: A beautiful flower with a sanguine color.
agricraft.plant.thermal_barley.desc: A cereal grain which can be ground into flour or malted to make beer or whiskey.
agricraft.plant.thermal_bell_pepper.desc: A cultivar of peppers without the spice. Commonly chopped and used in dishes.
agricraft.plant.thermal_coffee.desc: The fruit of a coffee tree, the pit of which can be roasted, ground, and brewed to make the lifeblood of mod devs.
agricraft.plant.thermal_corn.desc: A staple grain prized for its versatility.
agricraft.plant.thermal_eggplant.desc: A purple, spongy fruit used in many dishes. Tends to absorb other flavors.
agricraft.plant.thermal_frost_melon.desc: A blue cultivar of melons. Those who consume it find that even the hottest of surfaces feel icy.
agricraft.plant.thermal_green_bean.desc: The immature seed pods of a bean plant. Can be consumed alone or cooked in various dishes.
agricraft.plant.thermal_hops.desc: The seed cones of a flowering hop vine. Used to flavor beer.
agricraft.plant.thermal_onion.desc: A bulbous vegetable that is often used to add flavor to a savory dish. Brings people to tears.
agricraft.plant.thermal_peanut.desc: The seeds of a peanut plant. Often roasted, pressed into oil, or ground into peanut butter.
agricraft.plant.thermal_radish.desc: A root vegetable with a sharp flavor, typically eaten raw or steamed.
agricraft.plant.thermal_rice.desc: The most widely consumed staple grain in the world. Laborious to harvest.
agricraft.plant.thermal_sadiroot.desc: A medicinal spice known for its cleansing properties. Has a distinctive aroma.
agricraft.plant.thermal_spinach.desc: The leaves of a spinach plant. Grants sailors an increase in muscle mass.
agricraft.plant.thermal_strawberry.desc: A sweet, red fruit used in a variety of condiments and desserts.
agricraft.plant.thermal_tea.desc: The leaves of a tea plant. Often dumped into the ocean during tea parties.
agricraft.plant.thermal_tomato.desc: A savory, red fruit often sliced for dishes or squeezed for sauces and soups.
